title: People Magazine Investigates: Crimes of Fashion
overview: People Magazine Investigates: Crimes of Fashion explores high-profile and unique stories, where glitz and glam meet the darkest of human impulses. Each hour-long episode follows the career of the fashion world's most glamorous designers and models. Each episode traces their ride to the top, as well as the series of events that lead to the final tragedy. Intimate interviews with family, friends, and investigators bring a personal and unique access into the real people behind the fame and notoriety. Recreations and archival bring viewers right into the thick of the moments that shook the fashion world forever.
